text: tum to allaah ke siva bas unakee vandana kar rahe ho, jo moortiyaan hain tatha tum jhooth ghad rahe ho, vaastav mein, jinhen tum pooj rahe ho allaah ke siva, ve nahin adhikaar rakhate hain tumhaare lie jeevika dene ka. atah, khoj karo allaah ke paas jeevika kee tatha ibaadat (vandana) karo usakee aur krtagy bano usake, usee kee or tum phere jaoge
